# [Interview #897: Twitter 2013 (Non-WoT), Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=897#1)

#### [Clayton Boyd (3 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/ClaytonBoyd_SA/status/286768745215561728)

Excited about
*Memory if Light*
in a week. Any idea about book 2 of Stormlight Archive?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (3 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/286776938113159168)

Next fall, hopefully.
